'use strict';
 
/**
 * @private
 *
 * @description
 *
 * Cache stats.
 * Represents cache statistic
 * @constructor
 */
function CacheStats() {
  this.puts = 0;
  this.hits = 0;
  this.misses = 0;
  this.expirations = 0;
  this.size = 0;
}
 
/**
 *
 * @param {boolean} [_new=true]
 */
CacheStats.prototype.put = function (_new) {
  _new = _new !== false;
  this.puts++;
  if (_new) {
    this.size++;
  }
};
 
CacheStats.prototype.hit = function () {
  this.hits++;
};
 
CacheStats.prototype.miss = function (expired) {
  this.misses++;
  if (expired) {
    this.expirations++;
  }
};
 
CacheStats.prototype.delete = function () {
  if (this.size > 0) {
    this.size--;
  }
};
 
CacheStats.prototype.clear = function () {
  this.size = 0;
};
 
module.exports = CacheStats;
 
Code coverage generated by istanbul at Thu Aug 11 2016 11:39:03 GMT-0700 (PDT)
